ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: But Allah knows best what they are storing in their hearts.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: But God knows what they harbour in their breasts.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Allah knows best what they are accumulating (in their Record).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: but God knows best whatever they accumulate in their hearts.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And Allah well knows what they conceal in their hearts.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And Allah knows best what they gather,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And Allah knows best what they hide,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and God knows very well what they are secreting.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And Allah knoweth best what they are hiding.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: God is quite aware of what they are storing in their hearts.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Whereas Allah knoweth best that which they cherish.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and Allah knows best what they keep to themselves.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: But Allah has full knowledge of what they secrete (in their breasts)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And Allah knows best what they gather (of good and bad deeds),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and Allah knows very well what they gather.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: But God knows what they hide inside.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And Allah is most knowing of what they keep within themselves.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [84:23] and God knows best what they are amassing, accumulating in their scrolls, in the way of disbelief, denial   and evil deeds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And Allah knoweth best what they are hiding) and Allah knows best what they say and do; and it is also said this means: Allah knows best what they hear and hide in their hearts.
